name: Braised Cabbage With Apple and Caraway Seeds
keywords: apple, cabbage, caraway seeds, fall, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 small head firm cabbage, coarsely shredded, about 5 cups
1 medium-size apple, peeled, cored and cut in thin slices
1/2 cup fresh or canned chicken broth
Salt and freshly ground white pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter in a skillet and add the onion and garlic. Cook, stirring, until wilted. Do not brown. Add the cabbage, apple, vinegar, caraway seeds, chicken broth, salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil, stir, cover and simmer for 15 minutes. Uncover and if there is too much liquid, reduce it accordingly.
